content: the cobbles & vines book nook is a fun crochet pattern to create a cosy book nook the stitch used is custom easy and fully explained in the pattern and it requires colour change only once so no worries about having too many ends to weave in the pattern has the gauge and instruction for a nook for a standard book there are also instructions to adjust the sizing for a specific book to crochet this book nook using dk yarn you will need around 40 grams in each colour or around 100 m in each colour - so it s perfect to use up some scraps you will need a 4 5 mm hook or hook to meet gauge or you can follow the made-to-measure instructions it s a fun make and the pattern has schematic instructions photos and video tutorials as well so it s perfect for beginner crocheters as well as more advanced ones the pattern is a pdf of 10 pages including the tester gallery with external tutorials prepared by me for this pattern to help beginner crocheters at every step if you have trouble downloading the patter or at any point you need help you can contact me at lolla olayarn@gmail com or on insta at @o_layarn
